skins.shipDescription: Are you the one in charge here? The "Commander"? I'm Monica, the dealer! Well, dealer-in-training. I know it's sudden, but would you care to gamble with me? The stakes will, of course, be high!
skins.selfIntroduction: Why do I want to be a dealer? Because it's cool! Why else? Dealer distribute cards with so much style, and they've got such solid poker faces!
skins.acquisition: Are you the one in charge here? The "Commander"? I'm Monica, the dealer! Well, dealer-in-training. I know it's sudden, but would you care to gamble with me? The stakes will, of course, be high!
skins.login: Greetings, Commander. What do you say to... a small bet before starting work?
skins.details: High-stakes gamble are once-a-day only! You'll have to wait until tomorrow to give the wheel another spin, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Which do you prefer, Commander? Skill-based card games, or luck-based roulette?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You can wager more than just chips. Like an afternoon teatime, for instance. The loser provides the tea and biscuits!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Something... on your mind? I could offer you some insight, if you'd like. Assuming you win this next bet, that is!
skins.secretaryTouch: This next gamble wiiiill... have to wait until our work is finished!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Th-there's no sleight of hand going on here!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Heheh. Is there something the matter?

skins.shipDescription: "Welcome to Monica's Fantabulous Casino! Where you can have your every whim satisfied!" ...Oh, that doesn't sound very casino-managery? Heheh!
skins.acquisition: "Welcome to Monica's Fantabulous Casino! Where you can have your every whim satisfied!" ...Oh, that doesn't sound very casino-managery? Heheh!
skins.login: Welcome, Commander! Enjoy your stay at the Fantabulous Casino! Here are your chips for the day.
skins.details: "You want my fortune, do ya? Beat me in cards, and it's all yours, kid!" ...That's how they do those huge gambles in movies, right? Heheh!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Would you like a nice, cold beverage? It'll clear your head, I can promise you that!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Be it at work or at the tables, you always need a clear head and a poker face! Those so happen to be my special skills!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Don't you think it's interesting how, even though the odds are the same for everyone, if there are winners, there must be losers too?
skins.secretaryIdle4: I see you blushing there, Commander. Heheh, eyes on the prize!
skins.secretaryTouch: You've run out of chips? Now, that just won't do! Here you are. Spend them wisely, okay?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: A slave to temptation, are we? Heheh, you'll have to fix that if you want any favors from Lady Luck!
